message: is there any reason why twit is no longer rerun pre-edited shows?

with the exception for twit (airs Monday morning here) and nsfw, I can't catch any other shows live. usually I didn't mind having the live stream running. but recently, the playlist kinda sucked, mostly filled with week (sometimes 2 week) old shows
I mean, I would love to catch the shows live, except that most show airs when I'm asleep, and TNT wraps when I wake-up
/end rant. I guess I just have to suck it up like a big boy :(

You mean would rather see the live 'version', which is mostly the same as the edited version but without the possible banter at the start and end? You can always turn to justin.tv/twit and find it there. Or you could set up your own system and record the live feed to watch later: http://wiki.twit.tv/wiki/How_to_Record_TWiT
I hate reruns want all newshows
@unwrangle, I've made a post with an explanation on accessing previous TWiT archives on Justin.tv channel https://convore.com/twit/fyi-the-justintv-twit-channel-has-everything-archived-from-day-1/

@spaceguy1 i know and thank you, but browsing through the 2-hour chunks errgh... the best part about old twit stream it kinda replace tv. running in the background while i work,.. it's kinda having a news channel running in the workplace thing? now, i just playing the alternative playlists from 8tracks.com (and no, no pandora or rdio here)
what do you mean by nolonger running pre-edited shows?  when did they start doing that?
@superpc as the title, I meant reruns
The tricaster has recording problems so they currently can't rerun a show immediately afterwards and have to wait until the other recording has been edited.
Agree, i wish there was a way to make sense out of the Justin.TV archives.
